Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Ha! I crack myself up...


But honestly, I hate being like this. I wish
I was half as comfortable in undies as
Bougan over there.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It terrified me just leaving the stable
without clothes or equipment.

I can't imagine trying to fight monsters
this way, like Sango and Drant.

Those two went to the monster den just
up the road.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I told them to come back at the first sign
of danger, but... <sp:5:0:0>Still no sign of them.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>Hey, it's you! <sp:5:0:0>The reason we can wear
clothes again!
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease>I've had it with hanging around in
my skivvies.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Word has it that lots of ruins fell out of
the sky over <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> to the east.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I can't wait to go there and immerse
myself in research!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Oh! You're still wearing your underwear?<sp:5:0:0>
You don't mind it, huh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>As for me, I'm thrilled, just thrilled, that I
can wear clothes again!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Who are you? <sp:5:1:0>A traveler?<sp:0:4:0>You may be wondering about our clothes,
or lack thereof. We're just doing what we
were told.
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:WorkHeavy_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Prepare your mind and body...<sp:0:4:0>and then explore in underpants!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Those were the orders handed down to
the Zonai Survey Team. 

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>As for why? That I couldn't tell you.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>Are you the new recruit?<sp:0:4:0>It's no fun being out here in our skivvies,
huh? But that's what they told us.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:WorkHeavy_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Prepare your mind and body...<sp:0:4:0>and then explore in underpants!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Doesn't make a whole lot of sense to me,
but orders are orders.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You look so at ease in your undies!<sp:5:0:0>
I wish I had half your confidence.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>You're still hanging out in your
underwear? <sp:5:1:0>Aren't you sick of it?
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>We meet again! I assume you're here for
fashion advice?
